Instruction: Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees Celsius). Use nonstick spray to coat a baking sheet.
Mix flour with garlic powder, cayenne pepper, and salt in a bag. Combine bread crumbs with the remaining garlic powder, cayenne pepper, and salt on a plate.

Coat the chicken pieces with the seasoned flour mixture. Beat egg whites with 1 tablespoon of water and place in a shallow dish. Dip the seasoned chicken in the egg mixture, then coat with the seasoned bread crumbs. Arrange on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake for approximately 8 minutes in the preheated oven. Turn the chicken pieces using tongs, then bake for another 8 minutes or until the chicken juices run clear.
